description:
Gross yield

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45341 Annual statistics of wholesale and retail trade
45342 Annual statistics: accommodation and food services

Definition:
Gross yield is calculated as follows:

Gross yield
= turnover
- purchases of goods for resale
- purchases of raw materials and supplies
+ stock of goods for resale at the end of the business year
- stock of goods for resale at the beginning of the business
year
+ stock of raw materials and supplies and of own-account
(produced or processed) semi-finished and finished
products at the end of the business year
- stock of raw materials and supplies and of own-account
(produced or processed) semi-finished and finished
products at the beginning of the business year


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Gross yield
